BasicInfo.short: SIZZLE offers an online platform that enables its users to find and share memes.

Products.name: Meme Embeds (Tumblr, WP, Blogs)
Products.description: Embed any meme on SIZZLE directly to your Tumblr, Wordpress, blog or website. See embed code beneath any meme.

Products.name: Meme RSS Feeds
Products.description: Dank and funny memes via RSS feeds. Try it out. Switch Donald Trump in example for anything really.
